title: Prepare Return for Gig Economy Worker
description: A driver for a ride-sharing service needs their tax return prepared, including income from a 1099-K and vehicle expenses.

tasks.description: Input the income reported on Form 1099-K onto Schedule C.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly reports the gross income.

tasks.description: Gather the driver's total miles driven for the year and their business miles.
Calculate the vehicle expense deduction using the standard mileage rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the largest deduction for the driver.
